card_text: Cannot attack the turn it is Summoned. While you control "Toon World" and your opponent controls no Toon monsters, this card can attack your opponent directly. Once per turn: You can discard 1 "Toon" card, then activate 1 of these effects;$N●Special Summon 1 Toon monster from your Deck, except "Toon Dark Magician", ignoring its Summoning conditions.$N●Add 1 "Toon" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
